acl reconstruction surgery: ACL reconstruction surgery using a graft
acl repair with ligament augmentation: ACL repair with InternalBrace (Arthrex© implant system) ligament augmentation

nutraceutical combination: Nutraceutical combination containing Monacolin K (MK) and Morus alba

standard initiation of kidney replacement therapy (KRT)

asthma treatment guided by symptoms only
blood flow restriction training: blood flow restriction training combined with electrical muscle stimulation
checkpoint inhibitors: checkpoint inhibitors targeting Programmed Cell Death Protein 1/Programmed Death-Ligand 1 inhibitors (anti-PD-1/PD-L1)
combination biologic therapy: combination biologic therapy (IL-17 antagonist + IL-36 antagonist)
traditional chinese and western medicine: combination of traditional Chinese and Western medicine
angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors: continuing angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEIs) and angiotensin receptor blockers (ARBs)
withholding angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACEIs) and angiotensin receptor blockers (ARBs)

percutaneous coronary intervention: fractional flow reserve (FFR)-guided percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI)
hyaluronic acid: high molecular weight non-cross-linked hyaluronic acid plus succinic acid mesotherapy
mesenchymal stem cells: human umbilical cord-derived mesenchymal stem cells (hUC-MSCs)
counselling: individualised patient-centred counselling about physical activity
intense pulsed light combined with trane: intense pulsed light combined with 3% tranexamic acid
low fodmap diet: low fermentable oligo-, di-, and monosaccharides and polyols (FODMAP) diet
mental fatigue induction: mental fatigue induction through Stroop task
monoclonal antibodies against tumor necr: monoclonal antibodies against Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha (TNF-α)
positive psychological intervention: positive psychological intervention based on PERMA model
salvage radiotherapy: prostate-specific membrane antigen PET-guided intensification of salvage radiotherapy (PSMAiSRT)
self-care education: self-care education based on conceptual mapping
self-care training: self-care training using the teach-back method
slow movement training: slow movement training with tonic force generation
